title: Boutique France Retreat in the Heart of the Cote d'Azur with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the epitome of French Riviera elegance at this charming retreat nestled in the hillside town of Vence. This boutique hotel offers stunning panoramic views of the Côte d'Azur, while its tranquil spa provides a serene sanctuary for relaxation. Indulge in the flavours of Provence at the La Table du Cantemerle restaurant, where locally sourced ingredients take centre stage.

Enveloped by two hectares of lush greenery, this French beauty offers you utopian surroundings for ultimate relaxation. Its prime location invites exploration, with the vibrant city of Nice and the medieval charm of Saint-Paul de Vence just a short drive away. Venture further to discover the glamour of Monaco and Cannes.
